overview: Taylor returns in this heavily requested sequel to the first "Voluptious Vixens" title as a big-boobed temptress taunting writers in the porn industry for doubting the present popularity of the Glam-Mams of the '90's. She literally gives up her ass this time in a scorching anal scene to convince a reporter that not only can you do more sexually with big knockers, the girls who sport them are hotter than tit-less wonders!
title: Voluptuous Vixens 2
